metadata.title: Sort the Court - A Fun and Addictive Simulation Game
metadata.description: Explore the whimsical world of Sort the Court, where decision-making shapes the fate of your kingdom. Learn game rules, features, and player reviews.
metadata.keywords: Sort the Court, simulation game, decision-making, Unity game, Ludum Dare 34

hero.p: Step into the role of a monarch and make wise decisions to control your kingdom's destiny in Sort the Court. Enjoy this exciting simulation game developed by Graeme Borland, and dive into its charming world.

gameFeatures.title: Game Features
features: Developed with Unity, ensuring smooth performance
Available on HTML5, Windows, and Linux platforms

gameplayInstructions.title: How to Play Sort the Court
instructions: Use your keyboard, mouse, or gamepad for controls.
Make decisions by answering Yes or No to various requests.
Balance the needs of your people, wealth, and military.
Navigate through random events to grow your kingdom.
Play sessions last only a few minutes, perfect for a quick break.

questions.question: Is Sort the Court still in active development?
questions.answer: No, Sort the Court is not currently in active development.

questions.question: What platforms can I play Sort the Court on?
questions.answer: You can play Sort the Court on HTML5, Windows, and Linux.

questions.question: Are there any system compatibility issues?
questions.answer: The game has not been updated in several years, so may not work on newer systems.

questions.question: How do I save my progress?
questions.answer: The game features an autosave function, so your progress is saved automatically.

questions.question: Can I play Sort the Court on Mac?
questions.answer: The downloadable version may not work on Mac, but you can try running it in a browser.

questions.question: How can I submit a bug report?
questions.answer: You can submit bug reports via the community forums.
